issue.title: [Java]Update checkstyle plugin to latest version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update checkstyle plugin version from 2.17 to 3.1.0
